headline: Dell Stock Has Tanked. The Case for Buying the Dip.
summary: Dell Technologies  stock has had an artificial-intelligence problem—but concerns seem overblown.  Shares of Dell have slumped 28%, to $118, since we recommended the shares on Oct. 8.  Morgan Stanley even downgraded the stock on Nov. 16 because of rising memory chip prices.

headline: TD Cowen Turns More Bullish on Micron (MU) as Book Value Growth Accelerates
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the AI Stocks Making Moves on Wall Street. headline: This Week In AI Chips - AI Advances Revolutionize Enterprise Software Management
summary: Recent advances in AI technology are set to enhance the management of large, complex enterprise applications. With CAST's general release of the MCP server for CAST Imaging, AI systems can now gain essential architectural context for these applications, enabling a deeper understanding of existing code. This development allows AI to perform tasks such as modernizing software, remediating technical debt, and analyzing change impacts more efficiently than before. By feeding deterministic...

headline: ASUS Unveils Comprehensive Storage Solutions at SC25
summary: ASUS today announced an all-new lineup of enterprise and AI/HPC-optimized storage and infrastructure solutions at Supercomputing 2025 (SC25). Recognizing the escalating demands of scaling AI models and memory-intensive workloads, ASUS storage solutions are now a strategic imperative, critical for sustaining efficient AI data processing and managing rapidly expanding datasets. headline: Nvidia’s Best Wasn’t Enough to Prop Up a Wobbly Stock Market
summary: Blockbuster results from AI bellwether  Nvidia  sparked a furious rally from Tokyo to New York early Thursday before indexes reversed course and tumbled in the largest blown gain since April’s tariff-fueled market turmoil.  Adding to the worries on Thursday: A shutdown-delayed jobs report ended a weekslong blackout on key economic data, but did little to clarify the state of the labor market and the potential for a long-debated December interest-rate cut from the Federal Reserve.  Nvidia climbed as much as 5%, before finishing the session down 3%.
